name: Entropia (Pidibidi)
description:
~Download the Windows-Exe to experience this game in all its glory!~

Welcome to Dimension XR-234. Here Particles like Protons and Electrons are squares. Put them together to create the ultimate Element: 

End-Of-The-Game-ium.

How to play:

Use your mouse cursor to push particles to each other and see them fuse - or split. Press Left Mouse Button to give your mouse cursor a short energy pulse. Or just lean back and let the beauty of the universe unfold in front of you.

This Game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 in August 2021. 

Used Tools:

  • Unity 2020.3.11f1
  • Aseprite
  • Magix MusicMaker

Used Unity Packages (Unity Registry excluded):

  • Text Animator
  • 40+ Simple Icons - Free

Used Fonts:

  • Science Fare (https://www.1001fonts.com/science-fair-font.html)
  • HiLo-Deco (https://www.1001fonts.com/hilo-deco-font.html)

In the WebGL Build the Post Processing dont work. If you want to see the game as portrait in the screenshots, consider downloading the Windows Version. There are MacOS and Linux-Versions which arent tested though.
